info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:00AM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR EASTERN VERNON COUNTY... At 300 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walker, or 8 miles east of Nevada, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nevada, Sheldon, Montevallo, Walker, Schell City, Milo, Harwood and Horton. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 78 and 101. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
